content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.614 - Damage prevention program

State Regulations
(a) Each operator of a buried pipeline shall carry out a written program to prevent
damage to that pipeline by excavation activities in accordance with 16 NYCRR
Part
753, Protection of Underground Facilities. Each operator of a buried
pipeline, except for gathering lines in Class 1 and 2 locations, must
participate in the one-call notification system that covers the areas of the

State in which those pipeline facilities are located. (b) Where the operator has reason to believe
damage could be done by the excavation activities, the pipeline must be
inspected as frequently as necessary during and after the activities to verify
the integrity of the pipeline. (c) In the case of blasting, each inspection must include a leakage
survey. Notes
